author: jessepollak
content:
Hey all - just wanted to share this blog post from Coinbase discussing our support and contributions to EIP-4844: https://www.coinbase.com/blog/supporting-eip-4844-reducing-fees-for-ethereum-layer-2-rollups. 

We see EIP-4844 as a key enabler for bringing our customers into the cryptoeconomy with a secure, easy to use experience that is faster and cheaper. And we've been dedicating significant engineering resources to the effort to make it happen as quickly and safely as possible. Really excited to keep building with y'all.
